sourcesContent:
Organization

ID
{{ organization.id }}
Name
{{ organization.name }}
Organization Type
{{ organization.organizationType }}
Logo
{{ organization.logoContentType }}, {{ byteSize(organization.logo) }}
Active
{{ organization.active }}
Active Owner
{{ organization.activeOwner }}
Description
{{ organization.description }}
Address
{{ organization.address }}
Motto
{{ organization.motto }}
Phone
{{ organization.phone }}
Web Address
{{ organization.webAddress }}
Place Number
{{ organization.placeNumber }}
Price
{{ organization.price }}
Rent Type
{{ organization.rentType }}
Rentable
{{ organization.rentable }}
User
{{ organization.user?.id }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { IOrganization } from '../organization.model'; import { DataUtils } from 'app/core/util/data-util.service'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-organization-detail', templateUrl: './organization-detail.component.html', }) export class OrganizationDetailComponent implements OnInit { organization: IOrganization | null = null; constructor(protected dataUtils: DataUtils, protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ organization }) => { this.organization = organization; }); } byteSize(base64String: string): string { return this.dataUtils.byteSize(base64String); } openFile(base64String: string, contentType: string | null | undefined): void { this.dataUtils.openFile(base64String, contentType); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
